heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly sunny, except mostly cloudy in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley, with a chance of showers, mainly late. Highs in the mid to upper 70s.  South winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered showers in the Adirondacks, and near the international border from Jay Peak westward, slight chance in northeastern areas, and from the central and southern Greens westward. Lows from the mid 50s to around 60, with some lower 50s east of the Greens, and low to mid 60s in the broad valleys west. Light and variable winds east of the Greens, and south 5 to 10 mph in the west, gusting to 25 early in the Champlain Valley, and diminishing overnight.

heading: Tuesday
text: Showers likely early in the Adirondacks, otherwise scattered to widely scattered, with a rumble of thunder possible. Highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s north, mid to upper 70s in the south. Winds variable to south around 5 mph, except gusting to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.
